basicFeatureDescription: Enjoy these basic features regardless of which plan you choose
cancellationQuestion: How can I cancel my subscription?
cancellationAnswer: You can cancel your subscription at any time by going to the Settings page and clicking on the 'Cancel Subscription' button in the 'Subscription' section.
refundAnswer: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service, you can request a full refund during this period.
paymentMethodsQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and cryptocurrency transfers (Bitcoin, Ethereum).
changeSubscriptionQuestion: Can I change my subscription plan?
changeSubscriptionAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. You will be billed on a pro-rated basis for the remaining time of your current billing period.
subscriptionUpgradedDescription: Your subscription has been successfully upgraded. Enjoy your new features!
errorUpgradingSubscriptionDescription: We encountered an issue while trying to upgrade your subscription. Please try again later.
paymentMethodDisabledDescription: This payment method is currently not available. Please choose another payment method.
